page.title: 16POPULAR INFANT ACTIVITIES
page.content: WHAT DO WE DO AT SCHOOL?I LIKE PLAYING FOOTBALL WITH THE BIG BOYS IN THE PLAYGROUND.I LIKE WRITING IN MY ACTIVITY BOOK.ILIKE ALL THE SCHOOL DINNERS.I LIKE PLAYING G FORCE WITH THE KIDS.I LIKE PAINTING, READING, PLAYING WITH LEGO, SAWING WOOD AND FOAM, GOING SWIMMING GOING TO ELVASTON AND BELVOIR CASTLE.THE GAMES I LIKE ARE FIVE IN A ROW, CONNECT FOUR, STAR WARS, FUNNY FACES, STAY ALIVE, BLOW FOOTBALL, RACING SET.I LIKE COUNTING, READING, WATCHING THE TELEVISION, USING THE COMPUTER AND DRAWING.WE TOOK PHOTOS OF TREES FOR THE SCIENCE FAIR, WE WENT TO ELVASTON CASTLE TO LOOK AT SHEEP. AT BELVOIR CASTLE WE HAD FUN AT THE ADVENTURE PLAYGROUND AND FED THE PEACOCKS WHICH CAME ROUND US AS WE ATE OUR PICNIC.A BOY WAS FIRING HIS BOW AND ARROW IN THE GOLDEN ROOM AND SHOT THE LEG OFF A PLASTER PEACOCK LONG AGO
